thread.title: Ex-Falcons star QB Vick retires

author: Nick Brown
title: Ex-Falcons star QB Vick retires
text:
Ex-Falcons star QB Vick retires 12up 8 hrs ago Nick Brown Replay Video SETTINGS OFF HD HQ SD LO Plug in those Playstation 2's and boot up Madden 2004 folks, because it's time to pay tribute.
The man, the myth, the legend Michael Vick took to Sportscenter to announce that he is officially retiring from the NFL.
THIS JUST IN: Michael Vick tells @JosinaAnderson that he's officially retired from the NFL. pic.twitter.com/0sN66Ggo52
— SportsCenter (@SportsCenter) February 3, 2017
The Falcons legend and former Eagles, Jets, and Steelers QB ​​spent quite an extended amount of time in the league, despite many hurdles. The speedster revolutionized the way the position was played with his incredible running ability coupled with his outstanding arm.
However, his career will always be swallowed with a good deal of controversy stemming from his dog fighting case, for which he was arrested and served time.
Had that never have happened, Michael Vick may have had a very different career, and have been remembered in an entirely different way. But he might have unraveled in a different fashion otherwise.
A polarizing man and a spectacular talent. Sad to see him retire ringless, for sure.
For more from this author, follow him on Twitter @NickyBeaster or like his Facebook Page

And for everything you missed, swing by our Facebook page!
